direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve loan-related operations (renewing and repaying) with similar parameter handling and HTTP method usage.
Both methods involve loan-related operations with similar control flows and parameter checks.
Both methods access loan-related data, though one is for ongoing orders and the other for renewing loans.
Both methods handle similar types of exceptions related to loan operations.
Both methods involve operations that can affect the collateral account state.

enhanced_by.reason: Initializing the loan account is a common prerequisite for both renewing and other loan-related operations.
Setting up the loan environment is necessary before performing loan-related operations.
Verifying the loan status can help in asserting the outcome of the renew operation.
